Title: The Tale of Hraxian
Description:
Hello $n, it is good to see you.

Would you like to join us around the fire? I think it is time we heard a positive story about the obsidian flight of old.

I once promised yourself and Voraxian I would tell you the story from the vase you found in the Zskera Vaults. I believe it is that time.
ObjectivesText: Listen to the tale of Hraxian.

Objectives.Text: Listen to the tale of Hraxian
